Detailed Description

Holds a callback delegate and the state for that delegate.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Amib.Threading.Internal.WorkItem.WorkItem ( IWorkItemsGroup  workItemsGroup,
WorkItemInfo  workItemInfo,
WorkItemCallback  callback,
object  state 
)

Initialize the callback holding object.

Parameters:
callback Callback delegate for the callback.
state State with which to call the callback delegate.

We assume that the WorkItem object is created within the thread that meant to run the callback

Member Function Documentation

void Amib.Threading.Internal.WorkItem.Execute (  ) 

Execute the work item and the post execute.

bool Amib.Threading.Internal.WorkItem.StartingWorkItem (  ) 

Change the state of the work item to in progress if it wasn't canceled.

Returns:
Return true on success or false in case the work item was canceled. If the work item needs to run a post execute then the method will return true.

Property Documentation

bool Amib.Threading.Internal.WorkItem.IsCanceled [get]

Returns true when the work item has canceled.

Returns the priority of the work item.
